creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: torque with four dragons; two small dragons on either side at clasp end; two large dragons on either side of central motif which is a ball with two fish; frog-like and fish-like motifs surround large dragons; clasp attaches to dragon head hooks with ball in dragons mouth; clasp has three, beehive-shaped motifs attached
title: Torque
